feed.title: Cypress Hills (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cypress Hills (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cypress Hills Provincial Park 07:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -22.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -25.5°C
Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14 except minus 7 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. High minus 14 except minus 7 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning except plus 4 near the Alberta border. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight with risk of freezing rain. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight then becoming west 50 gusting to 70. Temperature rising to zero by morning except plus 4 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 25 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then clearing. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
